name: Tuyul Hunter [Demo]
description:
A platformer game based on Indonesian folklore, where you have to catch Tuyul (a dwarf ghost) who likes to steal villagers' values property. You decide to investigate where and for whom Tuyul works. You will go through many puzzles while chasing Tuyul. During the chase there will be lots of clues that you can use to solve the puzzles. Careful! Tuyul can set traps wherever he likes. Catch him and discover the mystery of who is behind all this incident. This version is just a demo.

Support us by participacing quesionare feedback, link on bellow description! 

Links :  https://bit.ly/TuyulHunterFeedback
